channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-0501|2024-08-04T06:02:52.170Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Buffer overflow in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.6912 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0505|2024-08-04T06:02:52.211Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper conditions check in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.33.49.5100, 15.36.38.5117, 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.30.5103, and 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure and denial of service via local

item.title: CVE-2020-0565|2024-08-04T06:02:52.306Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Uncontrolled search path in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7158 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0514|2024-08-04T06:02:52.198Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper default permissions in the installer for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 26.20.100.7463 and 15.45.30.5103 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0506|2024-08-04T06:02:52.198Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Improper initialization in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.29.5077, and 26.20.100.7000 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0516|2024-08-04T06:02:52.297Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper access control in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7463 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0549|2024-08-04T06:02:52.333Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20processors
item.description: Cleanup errors in some data cache evictions for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0504|2024-08-04T06:02:52.368Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Buffer overflow in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.30.5103, and 26.20.100.7158 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0556|2024-08-04T06:02:52.334Z -- intel -- bluez
item.description: Improper access control in subsystem for BlueZ before version 5.54 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and denial of service via adjacent access

item.title: CVE-2020-0574|2024-08-04T06:02:52.194Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20max%28r%29%2010%20fpga
item.description: Improper configuration in block design for Intel(R) MAX(R) 10 FPGA all versions may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and information disclosure via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0583|2024-08-04T06:02:52.304Z -- intel -- intel%C2%AE%20smart%20sound%20technology
item.description: Improper access control in the subsystem for Intel(R) Smart Sound Technology may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. This affects Intel® Smart Sound Technology before versions: 10th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 Processors, version 3431 and 8th Generation Intel® Core™ Processors, version 3349.

item.title: CVE-2020-0517|2024-08-04T06:02:52.185Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Out-of-bounds write in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 15.36.38.5117 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0511|2024-08-04T06:02:52.197Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Uncaught exception in system driver for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 15.40.44.5107 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0567|2024-08-04T06:02:52.313Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper input validation in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to enable denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0530|2024-08-04T06:02:52.389Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20nuc%20firmware
item.description: Improper buffer restrictions in firmware for Intel(R) NUC may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. The list of affected products is provided in intel-sa-00343: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-00343.html

item.title: CVE-2020-0550|2024-08-04T06:02:52.329Z -- intel -- snoop%20assisted%20l1d%20sampling%20advisory
item.description: Improper data forwarding in some data cache for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access. The list of affected products is provided in intel-sa-00330: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-00330.html

item.title: CVE-2020-0519|2024-08-04T06:02:52.289Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper access control for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.33.49.5100 and 15.36.38.5117 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0546|2024-08-04T06:02:52.389Z -- intel -- intel%C2%AE%20optane%28tm%29%20dc%20persistent%20memory%20module%20management%20software
item.description: Unquoted service path in Intel(R) Optane(TM) DC Persistent Memory Module Management Software before version 1.0.0.3461 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0515|2024-08-04T06:02:52.301Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Uncontrolled search path element in the installer for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 26.20.100.7584, 15.45.30.5103, 15.40.44.5107, 15.36.38.5117, and 15.33.49.5100 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access

item.title: CVE-2020-0526|2024-08-04T06:02:52.333Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20nuc%20firmware
item.description: Improper input validation in firmware for Intel(R) NUC may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. The list of affected products is provided in intel-sa-00343: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-00343.html

item.title: CVE-2020-0520|2024-08-04T06:02:52.302Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Path traversal in igdkmd64.sys for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.45.30.5103, 15.40.44.5107, 15.36.38.5117 and 15.33.49.5100 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0508|2024-08-04T06:02:52.296Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Incorrect default permissions in the installer for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.33.49.5100, 15.36.38.5117, 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.30.5103, and 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0551|2024-08-04T06:02:52.308Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20processors%20load%20value%20injection
item.description: Load value injection in some Intel(R) Processors utilizing speculative execution may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via a side channel with local access. The list of affected products is provided in intel-sa-00334: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-00334.html

item.title: CVE-2020-0503|2024-08-04T06:02:52.328Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper access control in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0548|2024-08-04T06:02:52.399Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20processors
item.description: Cleanup errors in some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0502|2024-08-04T06:02:52.294Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper access control in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.6912 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0507|2024-08-04T06:02:52.322Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Unquoted service path in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.33.49.5100, 15.36.38.5117, 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.30.5103, and 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-50197|2024-08-02T22:09:49.786Z -- intel -- driver%20%26%20support%20assistant
item.description:
Intel Driver & Support Assistant Link Following Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Intel Driver & Support Assistant. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the DSA Service. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the service to write a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM. Was ZDI-CAN-21845.

item.title: CVE-2024-3411|2024-08-01T20:12:06.847Z -- intel -- ipmi
item.description: Implementations of IPMI Authenticated sessions does not provide enough randomness to protect from session hijacking, allowing an attacker to use either predictable IPMI Session ID or weak BMC Random Number to bypass security controls using spoofed IPMI packets to manage BMC device.

item.title: CVE-2024-3411|2024-07-03T20:35:33.625Z -- intel -- ipmi
item.description: Implementations of IPMI Authenticated sessions does not provide enough randomness to protect from session hijacking, allowing an attacker to use either predictable IPMI Session ID or weak BMC Random Number to bypass security controls using spoofed IPMI packets to manage BMC device.
